tachyon.client

Interface RemoteBlockWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NettyRemoteBlockWriter

    public interface RemoteBlockWriter
extends Closeable
    The interface to write a remote block to the data server.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  RemoteBlockWriter.Factory 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void open(InetSocketAddress address, long blockId, long sessionId)
      Opens a block writer to a data server.
      void write(byte[] bytes, int offset, int length)
      Writes data to the remote block.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open(InetSocketAddress address,
        long blockId,
        long sessionId)
          throws IOException
        Opens a block writer to a data server.
        Parameters:
        address - The InetSocketAddress of the data server.
        blockId - The id of the block to write.
        sessionId - The id of the session writing the block.
        Throws:
        IOException - when the operation fails

      • write

        void write(byte[] bytes,
         int offset,
         int length)
           throws IOException
        Writes data to the remote block.
        Parameters:
        bytes - An array of bytes representing the source data.
        offset - The offset into the source array of bytes.
        length - The length of the data to write (in bytes).
        Throws:
        IOException - when the operation fails
